Opening For The Post Of Search Engine Optimization Seo

04 Aug 2009

This mail is regarding a Job Opening @ Zeta Interactive for the post of “Search Engine Optimization-SEO”

We are sending a brief introduction about the company profile and the job profile which we are looking at this point of time.

About Zeta Interactive\nEstablished in 1998, Zeta Interactive is a full-service digital marketing agency offering a wide range of services—from email and search marketing, to Web site development, creative services, social media marketing and mining, and more. According to the 2008 Advertising Age Digital Agency Report, the company is currently ranked among the Top 50 digital agencies in the U.S. and 25th among U.S. Search Agencies.

Headquartered in New York City, Zeta Interactive located in California, Florida, Idaho, Nevada, New Jersey, Texas and India.

Our clientele:\nThe company serves more than 200 clients currently, and to name a few\nThe Venetian, Bally Total Fitness, Wynn Las Vegas, Quiznos, BBC World Wide, Mattel, Sony Pictures, US Airways, Time Inc, Century 21, and HP.

About Indian Operations:\nPlan, Design and Develop New Features for our Product eBizmailer™ Customize our product on request from our premium Licensed Clients Manage day-to-day Campaign Requirements for our Full Service Clients Provide end-to-end IT Infrastructure set-up and Maintenance for our Licensed and ASP Clients 24/7 Support for our Licensed and ASP Clients Tracking email deliverability. Search Engine Marketing + SEO Website Development and Management Web Analytics

We are looking for\n Someone with 3-5+ years of hands on SEO experience .\n Account Management Experience\n Strong Communication Skills\n Excellent data analysis skills \nIf you are interested for this opening please reply back to this mail with a latest copy of your profile to glokinindi@zetainteractive.com

\nThanks & Regards
